snippet.title: Summer 2022 PitchYaGame Trailer
snippet.description:
Short trailer for Summer 2022 PitchYaGame Event on Twitter.

🔆Dewborne Dawn🔆
A world beset by a dire curse. A final haven built from a god's dying breath. A mysterious child, bearing a heavy burden.

Recruit, befriend, and call on allies to help combo, juggle, and fight in this hand-drawn metroidvania!
